title: Shoeshine girl
creator_credit: Peter Barton, Jane Startz and MacDonald Productions
brief_description: Story of a problem girl who goes to stay with her aunt during the summer vacation and the relationship she forms with the shoeshine man who hires her as his assistant. Raises issues concerning cooperation with others, and respect for the individual differences and beliefs of others.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Barton, Jane Startz and MacDonald Productions
